title: Chao Bian Wu Shou
synopsis: After the ultimate battle with the cursed evil god, in order to completely destroy the dragon army and protect the world, the super-changing braves boarded the Penguin battleship and arrived at a brand new city-Xinsi City. Dr. Leo built a secret base in Xinsi City. Yaoyao operates the central control center to monitor all corners of the world in real time. Once an emergency caused by the Dragon Legion occurs, an alarm will be issued and the super-changing brave will be dispatched for execution. task. In the secret base, Dr. Leo has developed a battle armor that can greatly enhance the power of the super-changeable God of War! It can be used as a vehicle for everyone to carry out tasks, and it can be perfectly integrated with the Super Change God of War, so that the Super Change God of War is upgraded to a more powerful form. So the super-changing brave and the teachers settled down in the secret base, constantly training and learning, and at the same time shouldering the task of guarding Xinsi City. The new leader of the dragon army, Uta, transformed his dragons into the appearance of ordinary humans, sneaking into the city silently and constantly creating chaos. At the same time, Uta is also planning a new dark plan, trying to create a secret weapon with powerful destructive power. Can the super-changing brave stop the turmoil in every corner of the city and destroy the dragon army's plan for world hegemony? (translated from iqiyi)
